title: Anything to cover up corruption
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

The drip, drip, drip of insults hurled at President Trump by the political left and some on the right leaves one to wonder, Why? The investigations of Attorney General William Barr, U.S. Attorney John Durham as well as the Department of Justice Inspector General Michael Horowitz are the key to understanding what is really going on here.

The hoax of impeachment by the Democrats is to prevent what they know will be exposed of their deep-state corruption. Mitt Romney knows what will be exposed of his family’s corruption. These strange bedfellows of Mr. Romney, Nancy Pelosi, Joe Biden, John Kerry, the Clintons, the Clinton Foundation, Uranium One and probably others all reportedly have the same thing in common: Their family relations cashed in on their notoriety in Ukraine, Russia or China to makes millions (and in Hunter Biden’s case, reportedly at least $1.5 billion). How? Through the overt or covert solicitation by the powerful, politically connected lobbying efforts of their elected family members.

This is the real, under-the-radar, dirty little secret they are afraid will become front-page news should Messrs. Barr, Durham and Horowitz proceed to the conclusions of their investigations. The deep-state expose of “America for Sale” deflection has nothing to do with Mr. Trump’s phone call and everything to do with the decades-long corruption by the political ruling class.

Deep state, be very afraid because the gig is up. You know it and “We, the People” know it. Mr. President, drain that swamp.

AL QUARTARARO

Virginia Beach, Va.
